We have the great pleasure of welcoming [Junwu Chen](https://twitter.com/JunwuChen25) as a new NCCR Catalysis PhD student. 

![](image.jpg)

Junwu joins the us from the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) in Beijing. If you want to read some of his previous work, they are available from his [Google Scholar profile](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=q5Oke7sAAAAJ).

We are super excited to have you here!
